return.description: Dictionary of available functions and values for generated DOM element.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

ui.components.Icon.longDescription: Uses icons from from the Clarity icon set. An `i` element is generated.

ui.components.Container.longDescription: Has similar properties to a HTML `div` element.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

ui.components.Heading.longDescription: Has similar properties to the HTML `h1`, `h2`, `h3`, `h4`, `h5` and `h6` elements.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

params.name: level
params.description: Level number to use for heading. Must be between 1 and 6 inclusive. Default: `1`.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function to call when main UI container has loaded.

ui.events.loaded.shortDescription: Call callback function when main UI container has loaded.

ui.components.Paragraph.longDescription: Has similar properties to a HTML `p` element.

params.name: children
params.description: Children or content to include in component. Default: `[]`.

ui.refresh.shortDescription: Regenerate the DOM to reflect the UI layout in `ui.screen`.
